---
# OCL qa
users:
  djazayeri:
   comment: Darius Jazayeri
   groups: 'admin'
   ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  jazayeri@alum.mit.edu"
  raff:
   comment: Rafal
   groups: 'admin'
   ssh_key: "ssh-rsa  raff"

datadog_config:
  tags: "provider:jetstream-iu,environment:{{datadog_environment}},service:ocl,ansible:full,provisioner:terraform"

docker_deployment:
  - oclapi-qa
  - oclweb-qa

docker_deployable_images:
  - repository: openconceptlab/oclapi
    compose: oclapi-qa
  - repository: openconceptlab/oclsolr
    compose: oclapi-qa
  - repository: openconceptlab/oclweb
    compose: oclweb-qa

letsencrypt_cert_domains:
   - narok.openmrs.org
   - ocl-qa.openmrs.org
   - oclapi-qa.openmrs.org

nginx_vhosts:
  - listen: "80 default_server"
    server_name: "ocl-qa.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
  - listen: "443 ssl"
    server_name: "ocl-qa.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      access_log /var/log/nginx/oclweb_access.log;
      error_log /var/log/nginx/oclweb_error.log;
      ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
      ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
      location ^~ /.well-known/acme-challenge/ {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
      }
      location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:7000/;
      }
  - listen: "80"
    server_name: "oclapi-qa.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
  - listen: "443 ssl"
    server_name: "oclapi-qa.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      access_log /var/log/nginx/oclapi_access.log;
      error_log /var/log/nginx/oclapi_error.log;
      ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
      ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
      location ^~ /.well-known/acme-challenge/ {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
      }
      location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8000/;
      }
  - listen: "443 ssl"
    server_name: "narok.openmrs.org"
    extra_parameters: |
      access_log /var/log/nginx/deployer_access.log;
      error_log /var/log/nginx/deployer_error.log;
      ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/fullchain.pem;
      ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/narok.openmrs.org/privkey.pem;
      location ^~ /.well-known/acme-challenge/ {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
      }
      location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000/;
      }
